H0.text: The 2010 Winter Olympics will be held where. Whistler

H1.text: The 2010 Winter Olympics will be held where. Calgary

H2.text: The 2010 Winter Olympics will be held where. Salt Lake City

H3.text: The 2010 Winter Olympics will be held where. Vancouvr

A4.text: The 2010 Winter Olympics were held in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, with some events held in the surrounding suburbs of Richmond, West Vancouver and the University of British Columbia, and in the nearby resort town of Whistler.

A5.text: Some events of the 2010 Winter Olympics were held in the nearby resort town of Whistler.

A6.text: The official Whistler website of the Vancouver 2010 Olympic and Paralympic Winter Games
